data.comment: The last target frames computed by the object-tracking plugin.
data.field: Shows if target object was detected.

The gripper target frame is represented as a 6D pose in the camera coordinate frame by (x, y, z, rotation around X axis, rotation around Y axis, rotation around Z axis). The current gripper utilizes only the 3D translation vector from the reference frame's origin to the target gripper frame, represented as (x, y, z, 0, 0, 0).

The base target frame is represented as a 6D pose in the camera coordinate frame by (x, y, z, rotation around X axis, rotation around Y axis, rotation around Z axis). The current base utilizes only the 2D translation vector and rotation around Z axis (yaw) from the reference frame's origin to target base frame, represented as (x, y, 0, 0, 0, yaw).
